Message:
I learned about the Duke
not long after leaving
on my journey.

Since he lifts
the Curses of witches,
he can probably also lift
the sword’s curse.

Or better yet,
maybe he’s the true master...

I came to Fran convinced
I was right on the money...

but I was wrong.
Just my luck.

Since arriving, though,
I decided to stay with
the Duke and search for
the sword’s master here.

After all,
I get to go to tons of places,
meet all kinds of people,

enjoy three helpings
of snacks a day...
Not too bad, if ya ask me.

But...less than a year after
joining the Duke and his friends,
something happened.

Once again, death came
knocking at my door...
